name: Space Ships Simulator
description:
A ship simulator that I have been working on as a form of portfolio to show off all of my game dev skills. I will be constantly updating this as I make more ships and learn more of the Ue4 game engine. 

Currently the game has 4 ships that you can fly with different textures for each one.  not all of the buttons are labeled properly but the game is playable at least for fun .

Ships contained with in the game at the moment are as follows : 

Tie Striker 

Tie defender 

Auzatick gunship (Textures not finished)

Protectorate star fighter 

Once you are through to the ship select screen clicking on a ship will zoom in on it, from there you can change the textures by clicking the icons on the left hand side of the screen (Unlabeled buttons for now). Then click  "Confirm Ship"  and off you go.

 the controls for flying the ship are :

Spacebar will turn the engines on

1,2,3 and 4 will change the your gear (or maximum speed values)

Left click will fire the ships primary guns (No secondary fire implemented yet)

W    is forward thrust 

Q   &   E  are for rolling the ship 

Esc will bring up the pause menu  

I know there are alot of things missing but they will be added as the days go on, if you have any issues or ideas do let me know.
